channel.title: Hi it's Abhishek!
channel.description: A blog created with Next.js and Tailwind.css

item.title: Introducing Tailwind Nexjs Starter Blog
item.description: Looking for a performant, out of the box template, with all the best in web technology to support your blogging needs? Checkout the Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: Images in Next.js
item.description: In this article we introduce adding images in the tailwind starter blog and the benefits and limitations of the next/image component.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: Markdown cheatsheet for all your blogging needs - headers, lists, images, tables and more! An illustrated guide based on Github Flavored Markdown.
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)

item.title: Sample .md file
item.description: Example of a markdown file with code blocks and syntax highlighting
item.author: abhishek.shree@outlook.com (Abhishek Shree)
